metadata.description: Gaming input optimization application for competitive gaming

master.name: master
master.description: Main development tasks for ZeroLag MVP

tasks.title: Project Setup and Dependencies
tasks.description: Set up Python project structure with all required dependencies for cross-platform input optimization
tasks.details: Initialize Python 3.10+ project with PyQt5, pynput, numpy, psutil, and platform-specific libraries (pywin32, pyObjC, python-evdev). Create proper project structure with src/, tests/, docs/, and config directories. Set up virtual environment and requirements.txt.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all dependencies install correctly on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Test basic imports and platform detection.

tasks.title: Core Input Event System
tasks.description: Design and implement the foundational input event interception and processing system
tasks.details: Create low-level input event hooks for mouse and keyboard using platform-specific APIs. Implement event queuing system with configurable buffer sizes. Design high-frequency processing loop (up to 8000Hz) for real-time input handling. Include emergency stop mechanisms and conflict detection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test event capture accuracy and timing. Verify no input conflicts with other software. Measure processing latency.

tasks.title: Mouse DPI Emulation System
tasks.description: Implement software-based DPI scaling from 400 to 26,000 with real-time adjustment
tasks.details: Create DPI emulation using OS cursor sensitivity tweaks and raw input processing. Support 50-unit increments and multiple sensitivity stages (up to 5 levels). Implement on-the-fly DPI switching via hotkeys. Add presets for common gaming scenarios (Low DPI Sniping, Mid-Range Aim, High-Speed Tracking).
tasks.testStrategy: Test DPI accuracy across different values. Verify smooth transitions between DPI levels. Measure cursor movement precision.

tasks.title: High-Frequency Mouse Polling
tasks.description: Implement adaptive mouse polling rates up to 8000Hz with performance optimization
tasks.details: Develop polling rate enhancement system with user-selectable rates (125Hz to 8000Hz). Implement adaptive polling to balance performance and system load. Add hardware capability detection and fallback mechanisms. Include performance monitoring and auto-throttling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test polling rate accuracy and consistency. Verify performance impact stays under 1% CPU. Test hardware compatibility across different mice.

tasks.title: Mouse Input Queuing and Processing
tasks.description: Create high-frequency mouse event queuing system with configurable buffer management
tasks.details: Implement mouse event queuing (position, movement, clicks) with internal buffers. Create rapid processing system synchronized with polling rates. Add configurable queue sizes (10-100 events) with overflow prevention. Implement algorithms to prioritize recent events for real-time feel.
tasks.testStrategy: Test queue performance under high input rates. Verify no event loss or delays. Measure processing consistency.

tasks.title: Mouse Smoothing and Precision Algorithms
tasks.description: Implement cursor smoothing, jitter elimination, and precision enhancement features
tasks.details: Apply low-pass filters and exponential moving averages to eliminate cursor jitter. Implement 'Consistent Shots' mode with adjustable click dead zones. Disable OS acceleration for raw input feel. Add angle snapping, prediction toggles, and rotation adjustment for grip compensation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test smoothing effectiveness in aim trainers. Verify click registration accuracy. Measure precision improvements.

tasks.title: High-Frequency Keyboard Polling
tasks.description: Implement keyboard polling rates up to 8000Hz with dynamic adjustment
tasks.details: Create keyboard event hooks using low-level APIs, bypassing OS defaults. Implement adjustable key repeat delay (0-500ms) and rate (up to 50 chars/sec). Add dynamic polling adjustment for high-intensity key bursts. Include hardware capability detection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test key detection speed and accuracy. Verify repeat rate functionality. Test with rapid key combinations.

tasks.title: Keyboard Input Queuing System
tasks.description: Create keyboard event queuing with high-frequency processing and buffer management
tasks.details: Implement keyboard event queuing (key presses, releases) with internal buffers. Create rapid processing system synchronized with polling rates. Add configurable queue sizes with overflow prevention. Implement priority algorithms for recent events.
tasks.testStrategy: Test queue performance with rapid key inputs. Verify no key loss or delays. Test simultaneous key combinations.

tasks.title: Anti-Ghosting and NKRO Simulation
tasks.description: Implement n-key rollover simulation and debounce algorithms for keyboard optimization
tasks.details: Emulate NKRO for simultaneous key presses to prevent dropped inputs during complex combos. Implement debounce algorithms with user-configurable thresholds. Add chatter elimination for low-quality keyboards. Test with common gaming key combinations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test simultaneous key press handling. Verify no ghosting in complex combinations. Test debounce effectiveness.

tasks.title: Rapid Key Actions and Advanced Features
tasks.description: Implement Rapid Trigger, Snap Tap, and other advanced keyboard optimizations
tasks.details: Create Rapid Trigger emulation for dynamic key state resets based on press/release velocity. Implement Snap Tap/Rappy Snappy for handling opposite directions (A+D). Add Turbo Mode for rapid key repeats. Include adaptive response tuning and actuation emulation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Rapid Trigger effectiveness in FPS games. Verify Snap Tap prevents neutral states. Test Turbo Mode functionality.

tasks.title: Macro Recording and Playback System
tasks.description: Build comprehensive macro system with recording, editing, and playback capabilities
tasks.details: Create macro recording for key presses, mouse movements/clicks, delays, and loops. Implement macro editor with timeline view for precise timing. Add support for nested macros and text pasting. Include playback speed adjustments and assignment to any button/key.
tasks.testStrategy: Test macro recording accuracy and timing. Verify playback consistency. Test complex macro sequences.

tasks.title: Button and Key Remapping System
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive remapping with multi-layer assignments and programmable functions
tasks.details: Create fully programmable button/key assignments including OS commands, media controls, and game-specific functions. Implement multi-layer assignments with modifier support (Hypershift mode). Add profile-specific remapping and hotkey switching.
tasks.testStrategy: Test remapping functionality across different keys. Verify multi-layer assignments work correctly. Test profile-specific remapping.

tasks.title: Profile Management System
tasks.description: Create profile storage, loading, and sharing system with JSON-based configuration
tasks.details: Implement profile save/load functionality with JSON storage for easy sharing. Create profile templates for common games (CS2, LoL, WoW). Add community preset library with import/export capabilities. Include profile validation and migration tools.
tasks.testStrategy: Test profile save/load functionality. Verify JSON format compatibility. Test profile sharing and import/export.

tasks.title: Automatic Profile Switching
tasks.description: Implement game detection and automatic profile application system
tasks.details: Create game detection system using process monitoring to identify running games. Implement automatic profile switching based on detected games. Add manual profile switching and override options. Include profile switching notifications and status indicators.
tasks.testStrategy: Test game detection accuracy. Verify automatic profile switching works correctly. Test manual override functionality.

tasks.title: PyQt5 GUI Design and Implementation
tasks.description: Create modern, lightweight GUI with real-time controls and performance metrics
tasks.details: Design PyQt5 interface with sliders for DPI, polling rates, repeat delays/rates, and queue settings. Add real-time latency and performance meters. Create visual editor for mouse smoothing and keyboard response. Include macro editor with timeline view and game detection interface.
tasks.testStrategy: Test GUI responsiveness and real-time updates. Verify all controls function correctly. Test visual feedback systems.

tasks.title: System Tray Integration
tasks.description: Implement system tray functionality with background operation and quick access
tasks.details: Create system tray integration for minimize-to-tray functionality. Add quick access menu for toggling optimizations. Implement background operation mode with minimal resource usage. Include tray notifications and status indicators.
tasks.testStrategy: Test tray functionality across platforms. Verify background operation efficiency. Test quick access features.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization and Monitoring
tasks.description: Optimize for <1% CPU usage, <50MB RAM, and <5ms latency overhead
tasks.details: Implement efficient threading using Python asyncio or threading module. Add auto-throttling during low input activity. Create performance monitoring system with real-time metrics. Optimize memory usage and garbage collection. Include performance profiling tools.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CPU and memory usage under various loads. Measure latency overhead. Verify performance targets are met.

tasks.title: Cross-Platform Input Handling
tasks.description: Implement platform-specific input handling for Windows, macOS, and Linux
tasks.details: Create Windows implementation using Win32 API (pywin32) for raw input and event hooks. Implement macOS support using Quartz Event Services (pyObjC). Add Linux support with evdev/libinput (python-evdev). Include fallback to pynput for basic compatibility.
tasks.testStrategy: Test input handling on all three platforms. Verify feature parity across platforms. Test fallback mechanisms.

tasks.title: Hardware Compatibility and Detection
tasks.description: Implement hardware capability detection and compatibility warnings
tasks.details: Create hardware detection system for generic USB/PS2 devices. Implement capability detection for max polling rates and features. Add user warnings for hardware limitations (e.g., 125Hz-only devices). Include fallback optimizations for limited hardware.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various hardware configurations. Verify capability detection accuracy. Test fallback optimizations.

tasks.title: Safety Features and Anti-Cheat Compliance
tasks.description: Implement emergency features, conflict detection, and anti-cheat compliance measures
tasks.details: Add emergency hotkey (Ctrl+Alt+Z) to disable optimizations instantly. Implement conflict detection for other input software (AutoHotkey, Razer Synapse). Ensure anti-cheat compliance by avoiding memory injection or game process tampering. Include transparency features and safety warnings.
tasks.testStrategy: Test emergency stop functionality. Verify no conflicts with other software. Test anti-cheat compatibility.

tasks.title: Unit Testing and Algorithm Validation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive test suite for input algorithms and core functionality
tasks.details: Write unit tests for DPI scaling, debounce logic, queue processing, and smoothing algorithms. Create integration tests for input event handling. Add performance benchmarks and regression tests. Include automated testing for different hardware configurations.
tasks.testStrategy: Run full test suite on all platforms. Verify test coverage meets requirements. Test with various hardware setups.

tasks.title: Beta Testing and Hardware Validation
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing across 20+ hardware setups and popular games
tasks.details: Organize beta testing across diverse hardware setups (low-end mice, membrane keyboards). Test in-game validation with titles like Valorant, League of Legends, and StarCraft II. Collect performance metrics and user feedback. Document compatibility issues and solutions.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute beta testing program. Collect and analyze performance data. Validate in-game functionality.

tasks.title: PyInstaller Packaging and Distribution
tasks.description: Create standalone executables and distribution packages for all platforms
tasks.details: Set up PyInstaller for creating standalone .exe/.app/.bin files. Create platform-specific build scripts and CI/CD pipelines. Implement auto-update mechanism and version checking. Add installation scripts and dependency management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test packaged executables on all platforms. Verify installation process. Test auto-update functionality.

tasks.title: Documentation and User Guides
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation, API docs, and user guides
tasks.details: Write user documentation with installation guides and feature explanations. Create API documentation for developers. Add troubleshooting guides and FAQ. Include video tutorials and community contribution guidelines.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for accuracy and completeness. Test installation guides. Validate troubleshooting solutions.

tasks.title: GitHub Setup and Community Features
tasks.description: Set up GitHub repository with community features and profile sharing
tasks.details: Create GitHub repository with proper README, issue templates, and contribution guidelines. Implement in-app GitHub integration for profile sharing and updates. Add community preset library with rating system. Create release management and changelog system.
tasks.testStrategy: Test GitHub integration features. Verify profile sharing functionality. Test community features.

tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Create a GitHub repository for ZeroLag and initialize it with a README file and a .gitignore for Python projects.
tasks.details: Use GitHub to create a new repository named 'ZeroLag'. Initialize it with a README.md and a .gitignore file that excludes common Python artifacts like __pycache__ and .pyc files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify repository creation and correct .gitignore functionality by checking for ignored files.

tasks.title: Define Project Structure
tasks.description: Establish a directory structure for the ZeroLag project to organize source code, tests, and documentation.
tasks.details: Create directories: /src for source code, /tests for unit tests, /docs for documentation, and /assets for any static files. Ensure a clear structure for easy navigation.
tasks.testStrategy: Check the directory structure in the repository to ensure all directories are created as specified.

tasks.title: Implement Core Input Handling
tasks.description: Develop the core input handling module using pynput for mouse and keyboard events.
tasks.details: Utilize the pynput library to capture mouse and keyboard events. Create a class for handling input events and implement methods for event listeners.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests to simulate mouse and keyboard events and verify that they are captured correctly.

tasks.title: Create GUI with PyQt5
tasks.description: Design and implement the main GUI for ZeroLag using PyQt5, including sliders for DPI and polling rate.
tasks.details: Set up a PyQt5 application with a main window that includes sliders for DPI settings, polling rates, and buttons for profile management.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the GUI application and ensure all components are displayed correctly and functional.

tasks.title: Implement DPI Emulation Logic
tasks.description: Develop the logic for software-based DPI adjustment from 400 to 26,000 in 50-unit increments.
tasks.details: Create a function that adjusts the DPI based on user input from the GUI and applies OS cursor sensitivity tweaks.
tasks.testStrategy: Test DPI adjustments by moving the mouse and verifying the cursor speed matches the selected DPI.

tasks.title: Implement Polling Rate Enhancement
tasks.description: Develop functionality to adjust mouse polling rates up to 8000Hz, including adaptive polling.
tasks.details: Implement a method to set polling rates based on user selection and ensure it can adapt to system performance.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate different polling rates and verify that the application responds correctly to changes.

tasks.title: Input Queuing Mechanism
tasks.description: Create an internal buffer to queue mouse events for processing at high frequencies.
tasks.details: Implement a queue system that stores mouse events and processes them at user-defined frequencies, ensuring no event loss.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the queuing mechanism by generating rapid mouse events and checking if they are processed correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Smoothing Algorithms
tasks.description: Apply low-pass filters and exponential moving averages to eliminate cursor jitter.
tasks.details: Develop smoothing algorithms that can be applied to mouse movement data to ensure smooth cursor tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the smoothing algorithms with various input patterns to ensure they effectively reduce jitter.

tasks.title: Implement Keyboard Event Handling
tasks.description: Develop the keyboard input handling logic to capture key presses and releases at high frequencies.
tasks.details: Utilize pynput to hook keyboard events and implement methods for capturing key actions with minimal latency.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate key presses and verify that the application captures them accurately and quickly.

tasks.title: Implement Anti-Ghosting and NKRO Simulation
tasks.description: Emulate n-key rollover for simultaneous key presses to prevent input drops during complex combos.
tasks.details: Develop algorithms to handle multiple key presses simultaneously and ensure no inputs are dropped.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with multiple key presses to verify that all inputs are registered correctly.

tasks.title: Macro Recording Functionality
tasks.description: Implement the ability to record and playback macros including key presses and mouse movements.
tasks.details: Create a macro system that allows users to record sequences of inputs and replay them with adjustable speeds.
tasks.testStrategy: Record a macro and verify that it plays back accurately with the correct timing.

tasks.title: Profile Management System
tasks.description: Develop a system for saving and loading multiple user profiles with customizable settings.
tasks.details: Implement functionality to save user settings as JSON files and load them as needed, allowing for easy profile switching.
tasks.testStrategy: Create multiple profiles and verify that the application can switch between them without issues.

tasks.title: Implement Hotkey Functionality
tasks.description: Add hotkey support for quick profile switching and DPI adjustments during gameplay.
tasks.details: Use keyboard hooks to listen for specific hotkeys and trigger corresponding actions in the application.
tasks.testStrategy: Test hotkey functionality by switching profiles and adjusting DPI while the application is running.

tasks.title: System Tray Integration
tasks.description: Implement system tray functionality to allow the application to run in the background.
tasks.details: Use PyQt5's QSystemTrayIcon to create a tray icon that provides quick access to settings and profile management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the application can minimize to the tray and respond to clicks on the tray icon.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize the application to ensure it uses less than 1% CPU and <50MB RAM during operation.
tasks.details: Profile the application to identify bottlenecks and optimize code paths for efficiency, particularly in input handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Monitor CPU and memory usage during stress tests to ensure performance targets are met.

tasks.title: Cross-Platform Compatibility Testing
tasks.description: Test the application on Windows, macOS, and Linux to ensure consistent behavior across platforms.
tasks.details: Set up virtual machines or use physical devices to test the application on different operating systems and ensure all features work as intended.
tasks.testStrategy: Run a suite of tests on each platform to verify functionality and performance.

tasks.title: Implement Emergency Hotkey
tasks.description: Develop an emergency hotkey to disable optimizations instantly for user safety.
tasks.details: Allow users to configure a hotkey that, when pressed, will disable all optimizations and revert to default input handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the emergency hotkey to ensure it functions correctly and reverts settings as expected.

tasks.title: User Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive user documentation covering installation, setup, and usage of ZeroLag.
tasks.details: Write clear and concise documentation that guides users through installation, configuration, and troubleshooting.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for clarity and completeness, and conduct user testing to ensure it is helpful.

tasks.title: Unit Testing for Input Algorithms
tasks.description: Develop unit tests for input algorithms including DPI scaling and debounce logic.
tasks.details: Create a suite of unit tests to validate the correctness of input handling algorithms and ensure they meet performance requirements.
tasks.testStrategy: Run unit tests and ensure all tests pass without errors.

tasks.title: Beta Testing with Users
tasks.description: Conduct beta testing with a group of users to gather feedback and identify issues.
tasks.details: Select a group of users from gaming communities to test the application and provide feedback on performance and usability.
tasks.testStrategy: Collect feedback and bug reports from beta testers to identify areas for improvement.

tasks.title: Implement Community Profile Sharing
tasks.description: Develop functionality for users to share and import profiles from a community library.
tasks.details: Create a system for users to upload and download profiles, possibly integrating with GitHub for easy access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the profile sharing feature by uploading and downloading profiles to ensure compatibility.

tasks.title: In-App Benchmark Tool
tasks.description: Implement a benchmarking tool within the application to test aim accuracy and key speed.
tasks.details: Create a simple tool that allows users to test their aim accuracy and key press speed with visual feedback.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct tests with users to verify the accuracy of the benchmarking tool.

tasks.title: Final Performance Review
tasks.description: Conduct a final review of the applicationâ€™s performance and stability before release.
tasks.details: Perform extensive testing to ensure the application meets all performance and stability requirements outlined in the PRD.
tasks.testStrategy: Run a comprehensive suite of tests and gather metrics to ensure all performance targets are met.

tasks.title: Prepare for Release
tasks.description: Package the application for distribution using PyInstaller and prepare release notes.
tasks.details: Use PyInstaller to create standalone executables for each platform and write release notes detailing new features and fixes.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the packaged application on each platform to ensure it runs correctly and includes all necessary files.

tasks.title: Launch and Monitor Feedback
tasks.description: Launch the application and monitor user feedback for future improvements and updates.
tasks.details: Release the application on GitHub and actively monitor user feedback through issues and community discussions.
tasks.testStrategy: Track downloads and user feedback to identify areas for future development and improvement.
